english: to make / to produce / to do
to look at / to watch / to read
to like / to be fond of
to see (have seen, catch sight of)
to dirve / to start / to open
to cook / to prepare a meal
how (indicative nature, condition or manner, etc)
to want / would like / to miss
to not have / there is not
used at the end of a (yes-no) question
used after an attribute, possessive particle, forming a noun phrase or nominal expression
used at the end of a (tentative / expected response) question
used at the end of or in the middle of a sentence to indicate a change or a new circumstance
